cover.title: management and application platform
cover.subtitle: Decentralized digital identity
cover.message: The contract address of IDHub token is 0x29F20242051AccDA50D52a7E272A5F23237e4696. Please check and verify your token address.

vision.title: Vision
vision.subtitle: IDHub is a decentralized identity platform which serves as an entrance to digital society. IDHub will empower user to reclaim their control of identity from service providers. Our vision is to realize sovereignty, security, and privacy and link identity to digital assets.
vision.service: Separating identity from applications to reduce switching cost among service providers.
vision.asset: Monetizing digital assets such as identity attributes and credit scores.
vision.life: Identity records could be the inputs of artificial intelligence for behavior forecasting.

Q4: IDHub can validate identities on the Ethereum testnet

Q1: Rollout of IDHub community developer program
Q2: IDHUB tokens can be used to pay for KYC services

downloads.subtitle: IDHub 是建立在开放原则之上，基于区块链技术的去中心化数字身份应用平台，具备良好的技术兼容性与功能拓展性。以安全、自主、可信的身份管理机制，最终实现以数字身份链接一切 (社会服务、数字资产、数字生活等) 的愿景。
